casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
HOMEOWNERS ASSO. No. 640PA05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 23, 2006. Roy H. Michaux, Jr., Charlotte, for Robert & Vivian Armstrong. Ted F. Mitchell, for The Ledges Homeowners Asso. Robert E. Dungan, Jr., Asheville, for Owners of Lots-Myers, et al. Hope Derby Carmichael, Brian S. Edlin, Roger W. Knight, Raleigh, for Community Association.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of March 2006 by Amicus (Research Triangle of the Community Association Institute) to participate in oral argument:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 23rd day of March 2006."
